description.value:
This gray metal band keeps your enemies within reach.

Ring Slot: Uncommon

Property:

When an effect forces you to move-through a pull, a push, or a slide-you can move 1 square less than the effect specifies.

Power âœ¦ Daily (Minor Action)

You and enemies adjacent to you or marked by you are either slowed or immobilized (your choice). For marked enemies, save ends. For adjacent enemies, no saving throw is allowed. As a free action, you can end the effect of this power on you and all affected creatures.

If you've reached at least one milestone today, while you are under the effect of this power's condition, any newly marked enemies or enemies that move adjacent to you are also affected by the chosen condition.
